RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Swallow Speed
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks determine how quickly a pawn begins vore (i.e., how quickly the prey is removed from the map and added to the pawn's hediffs). It does not currently impact how quickly the "passing" stages progress.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Speed-slurper
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] belts down prey at about four times the speed of other predators. [PAWN_pronoun] could dominate a prey-swallowing contest.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Quick eater
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] puts prey away quickly, at about twice the speed of other predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal swallow speed
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] swallows prey at an average speed.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Slow eater
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] takes prey in at a leisurely pace, half as quick as other predators.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Lollygagger
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has to devour prey real slowly, at about a quarter the speed of other predators, lest [PAWN_possessive] body reject [PAWN_possessive] prey.
